messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Suit sensors on, Unless you want to die, I once heard of a clown that got murdered by the CMO, But the CMO was arrested because the Clown had his suit sensors on.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Asshole Station 14, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Asshole Station 14, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We're fucked, Should we just leave while we still can?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Asshole Station 14. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Asshole Station 14 have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.
